channel.title: Pvp
channel.description: Now in lumbridge is pvp area. how i can delete pvp in where? or make safe.

item.title: Pvp
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

ii bandos ii:

We don’t spoon feed here you would have to try to search on Google or do it your self and if you get a error you can come here. This should help this topic.

How is this spoonfeeding? He is simply asking how to not make the lumbridge area PVP.
Stop being a dick/wannabe mod.
